bill.title: Relating To Medical Marijuana Dispensaries.
bill.description: Specifies that video monitoring and recording of medical marijuana production center and retail dispensing location premises shall be retained for a period of forty-five days. (SB305 HD1)

history.action: Introduced.
Passed First Reading.
Referred to CPH, JDL.
The committee(s) on CPH has scheduled a public hearing on 02-01-17 9:00AM in conference room 229.

The committee(s) on CPH recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, UNAMENDED. The votes in CPH were as follows: 5 Aye(s): Senator(s) Baker, Nishihara, Espero, Ihara, Ruderman; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 0 No(es): none; and 2 Excused: Senator(s) S. Chang, Kidani.
Reported from CPH (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 62) with recommendation of passage on Second Reading and referral to JDL.
Report adopted; Passed Second Reading and referred to JDL.
The committee(s) on JDL will hold a public decision making on 02-22-17 9:15AM in conference room 016.

The committee(s) on JDL recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes in JDL were as follows: 3 Aye(s): Senator(s) Keith-Agaran, K. Rhoads, Kim; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 0 No(es): none; and 2 Excused: Senator(s) Gabbard, L. Thielen.
Reported from JDL (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 675) with recommendation of passage on Third Reading, as amended (SD 1).
48 Hrs. Notice 03-07-17.
Report adopted; Passed Third Reading, as amended (SD 1). Ayes, 25; Aye(s) with reservations: none . Noes, 0 (none). Excused, 0 (none). Transmitted to House.
Received from Senate (Sen. Com. No. 119) in amended form (SD 1).
Pass First Reading
Referred to HLT, JUD, referral sheet 27
Bill scheduled to be heard by HLT on Tuesday, 03-21-17 9:00AM in House conference room 329.
Broadcast of hearing/briefing available. See: www.capitoltv.org

The committees on HLT recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes were as follows: 5 Ayes: Representative(s) Belatti, Morikawa, Todd; Ayes with reservations: Representative(s) Kobayashi, Tupola; 1 Noes: Representative(s) Har; and 1 Excused: Representative(s) Oshiro.
Reported from HLT (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 1374) as amended in HD 1, recommending passage on Second Reading and referral to JUD.

Passed Second Reading as amended in HD 1 and referred to the committee(s) on JUD with none voting aye with reservations; none voting no (0) and Representative(s) Aquino, DeCoite, Har, Ichiyama, C. Lee, Thielen excused (6).
Bill scheduled to be heard by JUD on Wednesday, 03-29-17 2:00PM in House conference room 325.

The committees on JUD recommend that the measure be PASSED, UNAMENDED. The votes were as follows: 9 Ayes: Representative(s) Nishimoto, San Buenaventura, Belatti, Brower, Johanson, C. Lee, Morikawa, Oshiro, Thielen; Ayes with reservations: none; Noes: none; and 2 Excused: Representative(s) Nakashima, McDermott.
Reported from JUD (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 1575), recommending passage on Third Reading.

Passed Third Reading with Representative(s) Cachola, DeCoite, Kobayashi, Oshiro, Tokioka, Ward voting aye with reservations; Representative(s) Har, Tupola voting no (2) and Representative(s) Quinlan excused (1). Transmitted to Senate.
Received from House (Hse. Com. No. 395).
Senate disagrees with House amendments.
Received notice of disagreement (Sen. Com. No. 514).
House Conferees Appointed: Belatti, San Buenaventura Co-Chairs; Thielen.
Received notice of appointment of House conferees (Hse. Com. No. 587).
Senate Conferees Appointed: Baker Chair; Keith-Agaran Co-Chair; Nishihara.
Received notice of Senate conferees (Sen. Com. No. 681).
Conference committee meeting scheduled for 04-21-17 1:00PM in conference room 016.
The conference committee deferred the measure.
